| A microscopic space fleet:* can [fly](/wiki/Fly "Fly").
* [does not breathe](/wiki/Breathless "Breathless").
* is [mindless](/wiki/Mindless "Mindless").
* can [lay eggs](/wiki/Oviparous "Oviparous").
* [can eat metal](/wiki/Metallivore "Metallivore").
* is neither male nor female.
* is normally generated [hostile](/wiki/Hostile "Hostile").

| **[Reference](/wiki/Source_code "Source code")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                | [SlashTHEM monst.c, line 2139](https://github.com/Soviet5lo/SlashTHEM/blob/develop/src/monst.c#L2139) |

The **microscopic space fleet**, x, is a monster that appears in [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM"). It is based off a [hallucinatory monster](/wiki/Hallucinatory_monster "Hallucinatory monster") that can appear in vanilla *[NetHack](/wiki/NetHack "NetHack")*.

- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Microscopic_space_fleet\&action=edit)*

[![This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.](/images/5/5d/Nh343var-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.")
html:
Microscopic space fleet

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
x microscopic space fleet (No tile)
Difficulty 5
Attacks Touch 2d4 shock
x microscopic space fleet (No tile)
Difficulty 5
Attacks

Touch 2d4 shock

Base level 3

Speed 5
Base AC 10
Base MR 0
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) 3 (Rare)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 0
Nutritional value 0
Size Tiny
Resistances none
Resistances conveyed none

A microscopic space fleet:

  • can fly.
  • does not breathe.
  • is mindless.
  • can lay eggs.
  • can eat metal.
  • is neither male nor female.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • never leaves a corpse.
Reference SlashTHEM monst.c, line 2139

The microscopic space fleet, x, is a monster that appears in SlashTHEM. It is based off a hallucinatory monster that can appear in vanilla NetHack.

This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.
Retrieved from "https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Microscopic_space_fleet&oldid=142624"
